Lyric:
[by:Davy___]
[00:19.27]We're a thousand miles from comfort,
[00:22.79]we have traveled land and sea
[00:26.82]But as long as you are with me, there's no place I'd rather be
[00:35.34]I would wait forever, exalted in the scene
[00:42.80]As long as I am with you, my heart continues to beat
[00:51.22]With every step we take, Kyoto to The Bay
[00:54.88]Strolling so casually
[00:59.07]We're different and the same, gave you another name
[01:03.81]Switch up the batteries
[01:06.60]If you gave me a chance I would take it
[01:10.43]It's a shot in the dark but I'll make it
[01:14.39]Know with all of your heart, you can't shame me
[01:18.31]When I am with you, there's no place I'd rather be
[01:22.80]N-n-n-no, no, no, no place I'd rather be
[01:38.20]We staked out on a mission to find our inner peace
[01:46.14]Oh, make it everlasting so nothing's incomplete
[01:53.94]With every step we take, Kyoto to The Bay
[01:57.92]Strolling so casually
[02:02.15]We're different and the same, gave you another name
[02:06.06]Switch up the batteries
[02:09.60]If you gave me a chance I would take it
[02:13.59]It's a shot in the dark but I'll make it
[02:17.39]Know with all of your heart, you can't shame me
[02:23.25]When I am with you, there's no place I'd rather be
[02:26.31]N-n-n-no, no, no, no place I'd rather be
[02:38.00]When I am with you, there's no place I'd rather be
[02:43.42]Be...
[02:53.46]Yeah-e-yeah-e-yeah-e-yeah-e-yeah, yeah, yeah
[02:56.76]If you gave me a chance I would take it
[03:00.67]It's a shot in the dark but I'll make it
[03:04.55]Know with all of your heart, you can't shame me
[03:08.59]When I am with you, there's no place I'd rather be
[03:12.96]N-n-n-no, no, no, no place I'd rather be
[03:24.50]When I am with you, there's no place I'd rather be
[03:30.37]
